name: Monads in the Enterprise
tagline: Scala, Play Framework and Functional Programming in e-Commerce
body: This blog covers describes functional programming solutions to issues as they relate to a major Canadian retail web site. My hope is to show working programmers how functional programming idea (such as monads) can be applied in a concrete way to solve problems and achieve clear and maintainable code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
